ing: 3 cups hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
n: Rule of 3 - Garlic Buffalo Wing Sauce
des: "Easy and delicious buffalo wing sauce. Coat wings prepared in desired method - I prefer them deep-fried and crispy."
ins: Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat; stir in garlic powder until dissolved. Add hot sauce and vinegar to butter mixture; bring to a boil. Remove saucepan from heat.
